name: Wizard's Life
description:
This game is made for Unexpected Jam.

Background

You are a wizard on a journey.

Premade Assets and Credits:

Dungeon, Monsters , Wizard, Knife Sprites: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Level Music: https://roccow.bandcamp.com/album/a-bed-of-snakes

Coding Help: Brackey's Turn Based Tutorial

Bug: Minor scaling issues, best played full screen.
